mapper.select: select exc.fload_id,exc.office_deal,exc.dept_deal,exc.note from excep_change exc where exc.fload_id=#{exceptionNum}
select emp.emp_id,emp.emp_name,rec.date,rec.work_state,exc.reason from excep_change_det exc,employee emp,record rec where exc.excep_id=#{exceptionNum} and exc.recd_id=rec.id and emp.emp_id=rec.emp_id
select att_src from attachment where exc_cha_id=#{exceptionNum}
